sentences.en: Direct inducement of strategic transformation includes external inducement and internal inducement.
sentences.cn: 企业战略转型的直接动因包括外部动因和内部动因.

sentences.en: financial inducements to attract good job candidates
sentences.cn: 吸引优秀人才前来应征的经济诱因

sentences.en: He did not have many inducements [ much inducement ] to work.
sentences.cn: 促使 他去工作的动力不足.

sentences.en: He hasn't much inducement to study English.
I gave him money as an inducement to leave.
I gave the Beggar some money as an inducement to leave immediately.
sentences.cn: 我给了这个乞丐一些钱,诱使他马上离去.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the inducement and treatment of erythrodermic psoriasis.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的探讨红皮病型银屑病的诱发因素及治疗效果.

sentences.en: Spiritual disorder is not only inducement and pathogenic factor but also consequence.
sentences.cn: 脑神紊乱既是诱因,又是病因,还是结果.

sentences.en: Sublethal temperature might be suitable for polyploid inducement of cold shocks.
sentences.cn: 亚致死温度是低温诱导多倍体的合适温度.

sentences.en: The secretary will need no further inducement to receive him.
sentences.cn: 国务秘书用不着更多的理由就会接待他的.

sentences.en: The term is also loosely applied to the inducement of scars ( cicatrization ).
sentences.cn: 在皮肤上造成隆起条纹瘢痕的作法,有时也称为纹身.

sentences.en: There was no [ little ] inducement for her to behave better.
sentences.cn: 无法 [ 几乎无法 ] 诱使她行为检点一些.

sentences.en: There was no inducement for her to behave better.
sentences.cn: 无法诱使她行为检点一些.

sentences.en: They offer every inducement to foreign businesses to invest in their states.
sentences.cn: 他们为外国企业提供种种优厚条件，以吸引这些企业到他们所在的州投资。

sentences.en: They offered him a company car as an inducement to stay.
sentences.cn: 作为对他留下的引诱,他们向他提供一辆公司汽车.

words.tran_cn: [遗] 诱导物；引诱者；导流片；电感器

trans.tran_cn: 诱导，劝诱，诱因，动机，[法]引言部分，刺激物
trans.tran_en: a reason for doing something, especially something that you will get as a result
